name: Yuna and the Moonstealers
description:
In Yuna and the Moonstealers you travel to different moons, place wells to help move around and rush back to the ship when your mission is complete! It's a fast paced, precision platformer!

Controls (gamepad w/d-pad is highly encouraged):

You can switch between Normal and Easy mode in-game. In Easy mode, you get extra wells to place in each room and there is no time limit on getting back to the ship.

Credits

Game made by FourierTransformerand markopolodev
